definition: great wide world/marvelously diverse world/(Buddhism) cosmos (abbr. for 三千大千世界[san1 qian1 da4 qian1 shi4 jie4])
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

pinyin: san1 qian1 da4 qian1 shi4 jie4

sentences.english: We are so small the universe of a.
sentences.chinese: 我們是這個大千世界如此渺小的一員。

sentences.english: After that, they were of their own, ready to enter a world with no boundaries.
sentences.chinese: 那以後，他們每個人都要到大千世界裏獨自闖蕩了。

sentences.english: I chould search this whole word over.
sentences.chinese: 即使我搜遍這大千世界。

sentences.english: Glorious refuge of sentient being, everywhere in the universe.
sentences.chinese: 有情衆生的怙主，大千世界你無處不在。

sentences.english: This wonder Wood started me thinking of all sorts of people in the world.
sentences.chinese: 由眼前的神木，我不禁想到了大千世界中的人。

sentences.english: With the twirl of my tongue I encompass worlds and volumes of worlds.
sentences.chinese: 由於我的喉舌的轉動，我繞遍了無數大千世界。

sentences.english: In the entire world there's nobody like me.
sentences.chinese: 大千世界，芸芸衆生，沒人與我相同。

sentences.english: Amongst the general public, though, there are much stronger beliefs about the power of dreams.
sentences.chinese: 儘管如此，大千世界中仍有人相信夢有更強大的功用。

sentences.english: The panorama of colour and action which fills the world is taken for granted.
sentences.chinese: 大千世界的五光十色與千姿百態被認爲是理所當然。

sentences.english: Endlessly varied art thou In the exuberant world, Lady of Manifold Magnificence.
sentences.chinese: 大千世界裏，你無窮無盡地變幻，華麗多姿的姑娘。

sentences.english: Compared with the vastness of the universe it is only a tiny spot one occupies on earth.
sentences.chinese: 浩翰的大千世界，一個人只能佔據其中微小的一隅。

sentences.english: A square inch place includes the infinite universe, small screen deduction in society all phenomena on earth.
sentences.chinese: 方寸之地包羅大千世界，小小熒屏演繹世間萬象。

definition: every living being (Buddhism)/the mass of common people
affairs of life/things of the world
this life/to lose face/to be disgraced
variable/changeable/fickle/impermanence (Sanskrit: anitya)/ghost taking away the soul after death/to pass away/to die
the teeming world/the world of sensual pleasures
